title: Ticket #4276: Reduce durable transactions
description:
When examining strace output for a busy CMS schedd, I found that we are doing durable commits for the following:
  • X509 information updates from the shadow (new proxy expiration time).
  • MATCH_EXP_* expansions when jobs startup (so each job start incurs two fsyncs).

Neither fsync seems necessary, and both seem to be sucking up a significant percentage of the time the schedd spends blocking.
